body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I have an Elasticsearch cluster with no load balancer, so I must specify more than one host when creating a client.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I'd like to specify multiple hosts in the Elasticsearh config. This should be easy since `elastic.SetURL` already accepts `(url string...)`. However, it requires changing the configuration file format.
title: Connect to a multi-node Elasticsearch cluster
